text: ai eemaan vaalon aisee cheezon ke baare mein (rasool se) na poochha karo ki agar tumako maaloom ho jae to tumhen buree maaloom ho aur agar unake baare mein kuraan naazil hone ke vakt poochh baithoge to tum par zaahir kar dee jaegee (magar tumako bura lagega jo savaalaat tum kar chuke) khuda ne unase daraguzar kee aur khuda bada bakhshane vaala burdabaar hai
